item.title: Watch Laptop Video on TV
item.author: BraveX
item.description: Watch Laptop Videos on TV Turn On SMB(Server Message Block) Window Data Sharing Protocol Go to Control Panel Go to Programs and Features Click the Turn Windows features on or off Check SMB 1.0/CIFS File Sharing Support -> SMB 1.0/CIFS Client and SMB 1.0/CIFS Server Add Guest Account Go to Start -> Setting -> Accounts Go to Family & other users Click Add someone else to this PC Select I don't have this person's sign-in information, and on the next page, select Add a user without a Microsoft account.
